label: A4B3_hP14_176_ch_h-001
title: $\beta$-Si$_{3}$N$_{4}$ Structure
comments:
\href{current_web_home_dir/A4B3_hP14_173_bc_c-001}{(Forgeng, 1958) and (Grun, 1979) place this structure in space group $P6_{3}$ \#173}. That structure is nearly indistinguishable from this one. 
 Si$_{3}$N$_{4}$ also exists as \href{current_web_home_dir/A4B3_hP28_159_ab2c_2c-001}{nierite, $\alpha$-Si$_{3}$N$_{4}$}.
